Peace and reconciliation continue to bear fruit. The IDB again recognized the country's progress and national unity
and for the good of Honduras, the IDB approves $ 30mn for Intibucá, Lempira, and Valle hospitals associated with the 10mil Bonus
In addition, the IDB also approves $ 59.8mn for security, including the training of new police officers
For the good of our Honduras, the IDB approves $ 75mn for health, education, and poverty reduction with the 10mil Bonus
Thanks to national reconciliation and reintegration into the community of nations, there are funds for social projects and security.
The international organizations are validating the effectiveness of the social programs of the government of Honduras. The town wins.
